text: Fomɨra God akar dɨkɨrɨzim Abraham ko an gɨn zuir ovaviba me ganɨga ghaze, a nguazir kam me danɨngam. Abraham, Moses Osirizir Arazibar gɨn zuir puvatɨgha, ezɨ God a ko akar dɨkɨrɨzim gami. Puvatɨ, Abraham nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itima, kamaghɨn God ghaze, nɨ nan damazimɨn dera. Egha God Abrahamɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn ganigha, kamaghɨn a ko akar dɨkɨrɨzim gami.
